title: Till You Miss Someone* (Snippet)
lyrics:
[Lyrics from snippet]
Love is a dream
They try to sell you in magazines
But you never really know what it means
Till you're with someone
Life is a wave
And sometimes you get carried away
You never wish that you would've stayed
Till you miss someone
I've been trying to love with my heart half open
Tell me you'll meet me halfway
I've been alone, baby I've been broken
I was just hoping you'd…
Stay, by the way
All this thinking gets in the way
If we say things that we don't mean to say
Then we'll hurt [someone]
